item.description:
[postfactum]

Talk

Hear no evil, see no evil, patch no evil: Or, how to monkey-patch safely.

By Graham Dumpleton

Python is a dynamic programming language and has a strong tradition of adhering to a programming style called duck-typing. This means that it is possible to easily modify an application's …
